page.title: 01Yealmpton Village
page.content: { { {Yealmpton}is a village situated 7 miles (11kms) South-east of Plymouth on the A379 Plymouth to Kingsbridge road. The {River Yealm,}which rises on Dartmoor passes through the village and flows into the sea at Wembury Bay. The population has steadily grown during the last 15 years because of the several new housing estates and is approximately 2000. In addition to being a traditionaly rural community supporting several thriving farms,Yealmpton also supports a few country crafts,small businesses and a little light industry. In common with many other pretty villages in the area, Yealmpton serves as a{"dormitory-village"}for many Plymouth workers.
